channel.title: xGaming! [Anti Grief and Grief] [Multiple Worlds]
channel.description:
Hello! We are xGaming! We are a friendly, small community always accepting new members! As we get a bigger community, we will need more staff. WE HAVE SKYBLOCK AND REGULAR SURVIVAL. There are two survival worlds, one with griefing, one without. xGaming was made to fill your every need! The IP as shown above is xgaming.us.to
Here is how Ranks work:
Green name- Default Player Blue Name- Moderator Red Name- Operator
Plugins installed on server: Groupmanager, WorldEdit, NoCheatPlus, CustomServerMessages, Buycraft, ColoredSigns, NoIPAdvertising, Vault, Multiverse-Core, uSkyBlock, WorldGuard, SignEdit, DisguiseCraft, SurvivalGames, Announcer, CoreProtect, Permissions, mcMMO, MobArena, Essentials, EssentialsProtect, EssentialsSpawn, Multiverse-Portals, Multiverse-Inventories, EssentialsAntiBuild, EssentialsChat, Factions,

@adster77 wrote:

Hello! We are xGaming! We are a friendly, small community always accepting new members! As we get a bigger community, we will need more staff. WE HAVE SKYBLOCK AND REGULAR SURVIVAL. There are two survival worlds, one with griefing, one without. xGaming was made to fill your every need! The IP as shown above is xgaming.us.to
